title: Jaxiumus decimus arillius
body:
Why is it okay for Jax to be a..
S class assassin.
S class tank.
S class AA based hyper carry
while building like a bruiser?

replies.body:
his real name is "Saijax" not "Jaxiumus"

he is in the "fall of icathia"

He is neither a tank nor an assassin. Sounds like someone let him get incredibly fed.

He has one short-range gap closer, no other mobility, and mediocre defensive stats. His W/R provide damage mitigation, but no more than most duelists get.

His survival depends on defeating people before they can apply sustained damage.
"Because ADC's are strong right now so everyone else that's op gets to be ignored"
Because if he builds like a bruiser, he is none of those. He is a bruiser.
